price: Wancan yãnã daga abin da Ubangijinka Ya yi wahayi zuwa gare ka na hikima. Kuma kada ka sanya wani abin bautãwa na daban tãre da Allah har a jẽfa ka a cikin Jahannama kanã wanda ake zargi, wanda ake tunkuɗẽwa*
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِمَّآ أَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ رَبُّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۗ وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتُلۡقَىٰ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَلُومٗا مَّدۡحُورًا
footnotes: * Wannan shĩ ne ƙarshen muƙãrana tsakãnin shiryarwar da Alƙur'ãni ya kãwo wa dũniya da abin da Attaura ta kãwo wa Banĩ Isrã'ĩla. Kuma akwai daidatãwa a cikinsu a tsakãnin hãlãye mãsu kyau da kĩshiyõyinsu, watau hãlãye mãsu mũni.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika mimmā awḥā ilayka rabbuka mina al-ḥik'mati walā tajʿal maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fatul'qā fī jahannama malūman madḥūran
